summary: Adds nearly 80 books from Daggerfall, Morrowind and Oblivion and three NPCs who're selling it.
descriptionHtml:
So, actually the mod contains 81 books (7 of which are skilltomes) from previous chapters which are sold by three merchants in Falkreath, Solitude and Windhelm. So it appears like "Hey, I came here from High Rock/Morrowind/Cyrodiil and I wanna offer you some books my grandpa left me!" Hm... maybe I should add some conversations about it to these characters later. Also, some books and skilltomes are added to Winterhold college, Bards college and a couple of other places.

When I searched through Nexus for such mod the only one fitting the 4E Skyrim lore and etc wasÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14938/]Extended Books Mod[/url], but it is so... small. And the same time I think only a couple of books from DG/MW/OB had a chance to appear in Skyrim markets (mean leveled lists). So I decided it wouldn't be bad if I'll just post another variant of such mod here.

---

1.1 Notes:
Some books removed from merchs and scattered through Skyrim
ABCs for barbarians added (textures from "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57120/]Book Covers Skyrim - Lost Library[/url]" used for illustrations).

---

Might conflict with some mods that are changing Winking Skeever interior, New Gnisis Cornerclub interior and Falkreath exterior (04).

And, please, report any bugs ;)

PS: Not sure what tag it should be, so I've set "NSFW" tag because of some books, you know, like uncensored volume 2 of The Real Barenziah.
author: Hy60koshk
